actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the discharge of dredged or fill material as part of Federal projects for the construction of the Fernandina Harbor Jetties, Florida, and the portion of the Intracoastal Waterway between Saint Mary's River and Saint John's River, Florida.

summary.text: Authorizes the discharge of dredged material from Federal projects for the construction of the Fernandina Harbor Jetties and a portion of the Intracoastal Waterway in Florida.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the discharge of dredged or fill material as part of Federal projects for the construction of the Fernandina Harbor Jetties, Florida, and the portion of the Intracoastal Waterway between Saint Mary's River and Saint John's River, Florida.
